posts.title: How to Create and Play an Online Game w/ Students
posts.summary: Download the file to see general basic instructions for creating interactive online games in your classroom.
posts.body:
## Introduction

Creating online games for students is one of the most engaging ways to teach complex concepts. In this post, I will walk you through the basic steps.

## What You Need

- A computer with internet access
- A free game creation platform
- Your creativity!

## Steps

1. Choose your platform
2. Design the game mechanics
3. Add educational content
4. Test with a small group
5. Deploy and play!

## Conclusion

Game-based learning increases student engagement and retention. Give it a try!

posts.title: Applications for Technology for Humanity Competition Are Now Open
posts.summary: TEKNOFEST's Technology for Humanity competition is accepting applications. Learn how to apply and what to expect.
posts.body:
## TEKNOFEST Technology for Humanity

The **Technology for Humanity** competition at TEKNOFEST is now accepting applications! This is a fantastic opportunity for teams passionate about using technology to solve real-world problems.

### Key Dates

- **Application Deadline:** March 15, 2026
- **Project Submission:** May 1, 2026
- **Finals:** June 2026

### Who Can Apply?

Students, educators, and professionals from all backgrounds are welcome.

### How to Apply

Visit the official TEKNOFEST website and follow the registration steps.
